body.name: Magnetic Color and Number Maze, Montessori Toys for 3+ Year Old, Wooden Puzzle Activity Board, Learning Educational Counting Matching Toys for Toddlers and Kids Boys Girls Preschoolers 3 4 5 Years Old
features: 🌟 Educational Wooden Activity Board - This magnetic maze Montessori toy is perfect for kids aged 3 and up. To complete the hands-on and screen-free game experience, using the attached magnetic wand to slide across the acrylic surface to complete the color and number matching game.

🌟 Innovative Multiple Difficulty Levels - Toys with multiple levels of difficulty never lose their value. Simple play - Magnetic wand easily guides beads through the maze from the left channel. Advanced play - The magnetic maze game has more complex and challenging routes, with the magnetic wand starting from the right channel and precise movements through the obstacles to help toddlers develop hand-eye coordination and problem solving skills.

🌟 Sturdy Construction - This wooden Montessori toy is made of extra thick, high quality natural wood and non-toxic water-based paint with smooth edges and corners, fixing with 8 nails to make sure it is sturdy and safe for small hands to operate. The attached magnetic wand is fixed to the board for easy storage.

🌟 Valuable Educational Learning Toys - Our magnetic activity board helps toddlers and preschoolers learn colors and numbers, develops number recognition and counting skills, improve their concentration and fine motor skill, and keeps toddlers busy for hours.

🌟 Great Gift for Toddlers 36+ Months and Up - The magnetic maze puzzle board is a great gift idea for kids and toddlers. Perfect gift idea for birthdays, holidays, travel and other special occasions. It is an excellent toddlers' toy for various places such as home, car, outdoor, travel and so on.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Magnetic maze toys offer a wide range of benefits for toddlers . They not only have a blast, but also develop a range of important skills. From fine motor control and problem-solving abilities to cognitive development and independent play, these toys provide a well-rounded learning experience.

PRODUCT DETAILS Attached Magnetic Wand The attached magnetic wand is fixed to the board for easy storage. High-quality Materials Made of extra thick, high quality natural wood and non-toxic water-based paint. Color and Number Matching The magnetic activity board helps toddlers learn colors and numbers, develops number recognition and counting skills. Innovative Obstacle Design Innovative obstacle design to increase the difficulty of the game to provide more fun.

GREAT GIFT IDEAS FOR TODDLERS AND KIDS This magnetic color and number maze activity board is a great gift idea for boys and girls ages 3+, for birthdays, Christmas stuffers, Thanksgiving, Back to School, Easter Baskets, New Year, Halloween Goodie bags, Great Novelty Gift Day, party favors, goody bag stuffers for kids.

Travel-friendly COMPACT AND PORTABLE- These magnetic maze toys are designed with travel in mind. They are usually small in size, making them easy to pack in your backpack or carry-on luggage. Learn More Perfect for Playtime at Home! ENGAGING AND EDUCATIONAL - This is entertaining activity for your little ones to enjoy at home. Magnetic maze activity boards provide a wonderful opportunity for toddlers to learn while having fun. Learn More Perfect for Playtime in the Car! PORTABLE AND COMPACT - Are you planning a road trip with your little ones? Keep them entertained and engaged during the journey with magnetic maze activity boards! Learn More Perfect for Outdoor Play! DURABLE AND WEATHER-RESISTANT - Magnetic maze toys are designed to withstand outdoor play. Made with durable materials, you can take them to the park, beach, or any outdoor adventure without worry. Learn More

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to use for my 17 month old, entertainment and helps grasp on the magnet like a pencil. Helps with fine motors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandkids love it!
reviews.reviewText: This is a super fun toy for kids and adults! I really liked that the magnet pen is attached unlike some other marble games I have seen. We had a birthday party the weekend after we got this and our grandkids and our kids all had fun playing with it. Even my wife took a turn and had fun with it. The entire board is smaller than I thought it would be but that actually made it easier for the little ones to carry. The cover is made of durable plastic and the board is made of wood. The marbles are all magnetic as are the movable pieces within the board. Our grandchild loves matching the colors and numbers and it was amazing to watch her concentrate as she played. The board is perfect for little ones as the marbles cannot get out of the board and even if the board is shook up, you can get all the marbles back into the home base either by tilting the board or using the magnet pen. All in all, this is great learning game for kids (even adult kids!).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun learning entertainment
reviews.reviewText: I really love Montessori type learning. This board keeps my child entertained while learning colors and counting. Of course, you’ll need to practice counting and the colors with your kid because this item doesn’t have audio but it’s great. My son likes it. I enjoy the two levels of difficulty it has. One way is to move the magnetized beads to the right then there’s a straight drop down to the colored labels. The other way is to use a maze where there are magnetized carrying ramps that you slide and take to other ramps until you get to the colored labels. I didn’t think my son would figure this out for a while since he’s recently 3 but he was able to do it which surprised me. It took a while but he played with it a lot. He takes a break for a few weeks then he’ll break it out again counting and doing the colors again. I wouldn’t expect any kid to play with this nonstop but it will surely bring repeated entertainment with your encouragement and excitement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Harder course is like an obstacle course
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This magnetic color/counting board by Zhiwuzhu is pretty cool. I didn't realize the 'harder' course had movable 'obstacles' that also hold the ball, so you transfer the ball into one and move it over and then transfer it again to the next. It's tricky, but great for motor skills and brain development, making you think harder. I don't know if my 4 yr old is quite ready for the harder course, but she most likely will need assistance with it when she's ready. I do like that this comes with a 'hard' course and 'easy' course. It's a fun obstacle game that can easily be used to make learning to count fun, while still exercising the brain. I do recommend reading the box and instructions. The magnet can be a little tricky, be careful with the balls touching the sides and also don't go too fast or it'll detach from the magnetic pen and fall back down. That can make it a bit tricky for a toddler to guide them. I think after some practice and explains how it works, your toddler can get the hang of it but there will probably be some frustrating moments while learning. Also, use it tilted up a little bit for the magnet to work better and if you don't want the beads to fall out of their spot. If any beads get stuck, just shake it a bit to get them unstuck, it truly works and helps. Overall it's a great, fun learning board that will be super useful in teaching my 4 yr old, helping her not only with coordination but exercising her brain and counting. I am hoping it will give my 4 yr old some practice in a fun way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for motor skills
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy the fact that this board has a wooden boarder because that means the magnetic balls have no way of “escaping” unless the cover breaks. It seems very sturdy and can grow with your little one to present an increase in challenges. My little one was please to attempt moving the balls and it let her entertained long enough for me to attend to the dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fun to keep kiddos busy
reviews.reviewText: All 5 of my kids, and my wife love this. They actually fight over who gets to play with it. Keeps them busy. I have to try something diff each time to make it more challenging for the older ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Know How FUN This Is Because I Tried It Out...! A Great Take-Along Toy.!
reviews.reviewText: It didn't take too long to figure out how this sorting game works. It is self-contained and easy to carry with you or in a carry-all. A Great car-trip thing to have to keep kids busy if they are bored... You use the small magnetic wand and sort the colored beads into the sections that they go in. It's not easy there are obstacles and it does take some dexterity skills too. Also a good diversion from screen time too...!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Kids
reviews.reviewText: A great educational game for the kiddos that my grandson loves.
